name: Appsense:Bucket Ball
description:
Appsense:Bucket Ball
Appsense:Bucket Ball is a simple ball game with fun, free and funny play
-Its Ball throwing game having a toy ball -Its one of the good ball game on android
-Color buckets are there for different scores
-Kids ,young old everybody can play it very addictive game
-You can develop Motor skills
-Available 10 different  levels of the game Bucket Ball
-Each level stores its score separately
-Supports phones and tablets

Normal: with an accelerating rate of the falling ball.
Expert: with variable speed and a few balls of different colors.
- Each level stores its score separately.
- Contain Red, Green, Blue buckets and balls.
==
- Supports phones and tablets

- If you have any questions, please email us.
